FireWire Settings:Window Upper Offset

Short name: 1394 Win Upper

Requires: Base Development System

Classes: FireWire Instr, Instr

Specifies the upper 16 bits of the 48-bit address for a FireWireï¿½ device when a window is mapped. The default is 0xFFFF.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
Permissions Read/Write
